getAllContactOnline(int) - Static method in class bl.Facade
this method allows to retourn the collection of the contact online of a user find by his id

this method allwos to return a collection who contain each contact connected at the system who is friend with the contact id in parameter

this method allows to return a collection of the contact in pendding of the resquest of the contact
getBlocked(int, int) - Static method in class messagerieDB.BlockedDB
this is the constructor of the class with two parameter, the id of contact who want to blocking the second contact (by the id of this contact to block)
getConnection() - Static method in class messagerieDB.DBManager
this method allows to connect at the data base
getContactsById(int, int) - Static method in class messagerieDB.ContactDB

getDemand(int, int) - Static method in class bl.Facade
this method allows to recovery the response of the friend request of an user of an other user, the request can be accepted or refused
